results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 24eb2dfe2743496e98839a9025c2d6f9. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users can't log in when they have special characters in their password.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported and there are regression tests.

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit d8e2a5ecea144116a93bdf9da225a58c:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.
